name: Classic Oxford Button-Down
description: A timeless essential for every wardrobe. Crafted from 100% premium cotton with a crisp finish, featuring a structured collar and tailored fit perfect for business casual or weekend outings.

name: Boho Floral Midi Dress
description: Flowy and feminine, this midi dress features a delicate floral print on recycled polyester. Designed with a cinched waist and flutter sleeves for an effortless transition from day to night.

name: Kids' Organic Cotton Hoodie
description: Ultra-soft and durable hoodie made for active play. Features a fleece-lined interior, ribbed cuffs, and a kangaroo pocket. Non-toxic dyes ensure safety for sensitive skin.

name: Urban Tech Cargo Pants
description: Modern streetwear meets functionality. These cargo pants are made from water-resistant nylon with multiple tactical pockets and an adjustable drawstring hem for a tapered look.

name: Silk Satin Evening Blouse
description: Add a touch of luxury to your outfit. This shimmering satin blouse features a high neckline and elegant pearl buttons on the cuffs. Pairs beautifully with tailored trousers.

name: Toddler Denim Overalls
description: Classic vintage-style denim overalls with adjustable straps. Built to last through every adventure, featuring reinforced stitching and easy-snap closures for quick changes.

name: Merino Wool Crewneck Sweater
description: Lightweight yet incredibly warm. This ethically sourced Merino wool sweater offers natural temperature regulation and a soft feel that never itches. A versatile layering piece.

name: High-Rise Athletic Leggings
description: Designed for performance and comfort. These squat-proof leggings feature 4-way stretch fabric, moisture-wicking technology, and a hidden waistband pocket for your essentials.

name: Graphic Print Cotton Tee
description: Cool and comfortable daily wear. This 100% cotton tee features a playful hand-drawn illustration. It's pre-shrunk to maintain its shape even after multiple washes.

name: Premium Leather Biker Jacket
description: The ultimate statement piece. Handcrafted from top-grain leather with quilted shoulder details and silver-tone hardware. This jacket develops a unique patina over time.
